attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petitioners know that the hunting act prevents cruelty and suffering to animals, and that preventing said cruelty to innocent animals is more important than a few people in the country keeping their  Sunday afternoon's titillation.

rejection.details:
There is an identical petition already here:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/keephuntingact/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
